name: Time Series Analysis with Prophet: Air Passenger Data

nodes.name: ReadCSV
nodes.description: It reads in CSV files and creates a DataFrame from it
nodes.details: This node reads CSV files and creates a DataFrame from it.
nodes.hint: Whenever the file is changed, Refresh the Schema

fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: path
fields.title: Path
fields.description: Path of the Text file/directory

fields.name: separator
fields.title: Separator
fields.description: CSV Separator

fields.name: header
fields.title: Header
fields.description: Does the file have a header row

fields.name: dropSpecialCharacterInColumnName
fields.title: Drop Special Character In ColumnName
fields.description: Drop the SpecialCharacter and Space in Column Name.

fields.name: dropMalformed
fields.title: Drop Malformed
fields.description: Whether to drop Malformed records or error

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Column Names for the CSV
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types for the CSV
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Column Formats for the CSV
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: ds
fields.title: DS Column
fields.description: Date or DateTime variable

fields.name: y
fields.title: Y
fields.description: Target Variable

fields.name: growth
fields.title: Growth
fields.description: linear or logistic to specify a linear or logistic trend

fields.name: yearly_seasonality
fields.title: Yearly Seasonality
fields.description: Fit yearly seasonality.

fields.name: weekly_seasonality
fields.title: Weekly Seasonality
fields.description: Fit weekly seasonality.

fields.name: daily_seasonality
fields.title: Daily Seasonality
fields.description: Fit daily seasonality.

fields.name: seasonality_mode
fields.title: Seasonality Mode
fields.description: additive(default) or multiplicative

fields.name: interval_width
fields.title: Interval Width
fields.description: Float, width of the uncertainty intervals provided for the forecast

fields.name: changepoints
fields.title: Changepoints
fields.description: List of dates at which to include potential changepoints. If not specified, potential changepoints are selected automatically.

fields.name: n_changepoints
fields.title: N Changepoints
fields.description: Number of potential changepoints to include. Not used if input `changepoints` is supplied. If `changepoints` is not supplied, then n_changepoints potential changepoints are selected uniformly from the first `changepoint_range` proportion of the history.

fields.name: changepoint_range
fields.title: Changepoint Range
fields.description: Proportion of history in which trend changepoints will be estimated. Defaults to 0.8 for the first 80%. Not used if `changepoints` is specified.

fields.name: seasonality_prior_scale
fields.title: Seasonality Prior Scale
fields.description: Parameter modulating the strength of the seasonality model. Larger values allow the model to fit larger seasonal fluctuations, smaller values dampen the seasonality.

fields.name: holidays_prior_scale
fields.title: Holidays Prior Scale
fields.description: Parameter modulating the strength of the holiday components model, unless overridden in the holidays input. changepoint_prior_scale: Parameter modulating the flexibility of the automatic changepoint selection. Large values will allow many changepoints, small values will allow few changepoints.

fields.name: mcmc_samples
fields.title: mcmc samples
fields.description: Integer, if greater than 0, will do full Bayesian inference with the specified number of MCMC samples. If 0, will do MAP estimation.

fields.name: uncertainty_samples
fields.title: Uncertainty Samples
fields.description: Number of simulated draws used to estimate uncertainty intervals. Settings this value to 0 or False will disable uncertainty estimation and speed up the calculation.

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
Airpassengers Forecast with Prophet.


  1. Read the data.
  2. Build the prophet model.
  3. Create the future dataframe for 24 months.
  4. Predict.
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Comments for the Workflow

fields.name: future_period
fields.title: Future Period
fields.description: Int number of periods to forecast forward.

fields.name: frequency
fields.title: frequency
fields.description: Any valid frequency for pd.date_range, such as 'D' or 'M'.

fields.name: include_history
fields.title: Include History
fields.description: Boolean to include the historical dates in the dataframe for predictions

nodes.name: Print N Rows
nodes.description: Prints the specified number of records in the DataFrame. It is useful for seeing intermediate output

This node is used to print incoming dataset.

Number of rows that needs to be printed can be configured in the node.
